message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't guarantee the quality of every item, rest assured that our selection process ensures a high standard. This particular product has been rigorously tested and meets our quality criteria. Given the nature of our products, we're confident it will meet your expectations. Please consider supporting us by making a purchase today.

I'm willing to take a chance on your product, but I'd like to know more about your previous sales record. How many potential buyers have there been, and how many products have you sold so far? I'd also like to know the proportion of high-quality products you've sold.

Hello! Thank you for considering our product. So far, we've had 20 potential buyers and successfully sold 10 products, with 5 being of high quality. Our current success rate for high-quality products is 50%. While we can't promise perfection, we strive to maintain this level of quality. This product has passed our quality checks, and we hope it will meet your needs. Would you like to proceed with the purchase?
I'll take a chance and buy the product. I'm hoping the 50% success rate holds true for me as well.
